## Client.newCollectionFromObject() method

newCollectionFromObject creates and registers a new collection under the given name. The input object must be serializable to JSON, and contain only json-schema.org types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newCollectionFromObject(threadID: ThreadID, name: string, obj: any, indexes?: pb.Index.AsObject[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  threadID | ThreadID | the ID of the database |
|  name | string | The human-readable name for the collection. |
|  obj | any | The actual object to attempt to extract a schema from. |
|  indexes | pb.Index.AsObject\[\] | A set of index definitions for indexing instance fields. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
